task.title: Write to Elasticsearch
task.shortdesc: We'll use the Elasticsearch destination to write to an Elasticsearch cluster. You write data to Elasticsearch as individual documents with an index and mapping fields defined to help return the documents on a search.

context.p: If you have an Elasticsearch cluster, you can configure the destination to write to your instance. For the tutorial, we'll use the default placeholder properties for required fields so we can run data preview instead of running the pipeline.
